name: Silicon
description: A hard, brittle crystalline solid with a blue-grey metallic lustre. A tetravalent metalloid and semiconductor.

name: Graphite
description: A crystalline form of the element carbon with its atoms arranged in a hexagonal structure.

name: Copper
description: A soft, malleable, and ductile metal with very high thermal and electrical conductivity.

name: Aluminium
description: A silvery-white, soft, non-magnetic and ductile metal in the boron group.

name: Titanium
description: A lustrous transition metal with a silver color, low density, and high strength.

name: Polystyrene
description: A synthetic aromatic hydrocarbon polymer, one of the most widely used plastics.

name: Rubber
description: A compound of isoprene polymers, with minor impurities of other organic compounds and water.

name: Glass
description: A non-crystalline, often transparent amorphous solid, usually formed by rapid cooling of the molten form.
